instruction:
Create a new folder named "Homework" in the Notes app. Then, create a note titled "homework_1" inside that folder and add the following content to the note:

Math exercises:
(1) Solve problems 1-5 on page 42
(2) Show all your steps
(3) Submit by Friday

parameters:
